relation: Standard Delivery (Royal Mail 1st Class Signed for)
textBeforeTable: We offer Discount postage & Combine postage along with a range of shipping choices. Discount postage & Combine postage is available on more than one purchases on the same product or same packaging and is automatically calculated at the checkout.  Please refer to chart below for your information. 1st class, Same Day Dispatched once payment received before 3pm Suitable for men and women ·          Start gently peeling mask off from the bottom upwards ·          Wait for 20 – 30 minutes until mask is completely dry ·          Take appropriate amount and spread evenly across your face or desired area (avoid eyebrows, eyes and lips).  ·          Apply mask on dry and cleansed area Direction: This cream is designed to clean and unclog pores. It also removes blackheads, dead skin and tiny pore hairs instantly. The tear off formulation become tight and adhere to the skin in order to lift the dead skin, dirt, oil and other nasties within pores, leaving your skin feeling fresh and radiant again while the plant extract soften the skin to restore a youthful glow. This product is very poplar and highly recommend in Asia Shills black mask peel off for removing pores acne and blackhead 50ml
textAfterTable: Superfast delivery - no need to wait 3 weeks for foreign ebay sellers and no customs charge. We dispatch orders daily except weekends and public holidays. In the event that orders are purchased before 3pm, we will able to dispatch your purchase on the same day, or else the order will be dispatched on the next working day. Royal Mail is our main distribute management business partner for UK and Overseas.  Overseas buyer please check your custom policy for your country before making a order as our stock is base in UK and we are not responsible for any custom charges or custom delays.   In event your order is not received, please kindly allow 10 working days before contacting us as Royal Mail will not file a claim under 10 days (Royal Mail policy). After 10 working days customer will have to submit royal mail postal receipt (this is supplied to the customer when seller have dispatched the customer orders) along with PayPal invoice and make the claim to Royal Mail for a full refund (postage fee on PayPal can also be claim).   Recorded Registered sign for post is provided in our eBay checkout and customers is recommend to use this service as sellers are fully responsible for this service. Item with this royal mail logo is not available for out of UK.
